column3: Latest;Phnom Penh:------ Sen Sok Police in cooperation with the Counter-Terrorism and Transnational Crime Force raided a villa in Sen Sok at 3. 30 pm on May 7.------They arrested 28 Chinese nationals involved in online extortion online. The operation was coordinated by Deputy Prosecutor Mr. Seng Heang.------The crackdown took place at a house on an unnumbered street in Samrong Village
column5: Sen Sok District. The police indicated that they  seized material related to many crimes.------At present
column6: the 28 Chinese nationals are being questioned by the Counter-Terrorism and Transnational Crimes Force. ------Rasmei News
